title: Province of Darkness
description: ISLAND OF EVILWhen attractive young Martha Grant happily accepted a position as governess to Sir Enoch's children, she was not aware of the ironic twists of fate that lay ahead. Yet as she journeyed across the churning sea to Orkon, a desolate and forbidding island off the English coast, a faint chill of fear ran through her...a chill that rose to an icy crescendo of terror behind the dark stone walls of Alwyn Towers. For it was there that she was trapped in a province of terror....
author: Patricia Morton
